function.name: get_weather
function.description: This tool is used to get the weather. The user can request the weather in a specific location and time. The user does not have to specify a location and time.

city.description: The city for which to get the weather.

state.description: The state for which to get the weather.

country.description: The country for which to get the weather.

location.description: The location object for which to get the weather

date.description: The date for which to get the weather, formatted as 'YYYY-MM-DD', if no date is given, default to today.

time.description: The time for which to get the weather, formatted as 'HH:MM:SS'. If no time is given, default to noon.

unit.description: The unit for temperature measurement ('c' for Celsius, 'f' for Fahrenheit).

function.name: open_website
function.description: Open multiple websites in the user's default browser

items.description: The name of a website to open, without protocol or TLD e.g. 'google' for Google.com

websites.description: A list of website names to open
